title: The ‘Kimberly Akimbo’ Creative Team on Assembling Their Quirky Puzzle
description: The playwright David Lindsay-Abaire, the composer Jeanine Tesori and the director Jessica Stone discuss their quirky Broadway musical, which was first a play.
dc:creator: Diep Tran
media:credit: Victor Llorente for The New York Times
media:description: David Lindsay-Abaire, Jeanine Tesori and Jessica Stone on the “Kimberly Akimbo” set.
